articles.author: BUSINESSTODAY
articles.title: Indian-origin scientist receives prestigious Shaw Prize in Astronomy for 2024 - Business Today
articles.description: Shrinivas R. Kulkarni, an Indian-origin professor at Caltech, has been awarded the 2024 Shaw Prize in Astronomy.
articles.content: The Shaw Prize, established by philanthropist Run Run Shaw, includes three annual prizes in Astronomy, Life Science and Medicine, and Mathematical Sciences, each with a $1.2 million award.

articles.title: NASA PREFIRE Postponed: Arctic Heat Mission Launch Delayed Due to Severe Storms - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA and Rocket Lab have postponed the launch of NASA's PREFIRE (Polar Radiant Energy in the Far-InfraRed Experiment) mission to no earlier than Saturday, May 25, due to a severe weather system affecting Launch Complex 1 in Mahia, New Zealand. The team will s…
articles.content: NASA’s PREFIRE mission, in collaboration with Rocket Lab, is now rescheduled for no earlier than May 25 due to adverse weather conditions at the launch site in Mahia, New Zealand. The mission’s objec… [+1805 chars]
